full_summary:
# Contract Notice: Replacement of Perimeter Fencing and Lighting at the Cowansville Establishment
### Tender Details

* Solicitation Reference: [WS3853411313-Doc3853504413](#solicitation-reference)
* Amendment: 5
* Solicitation Date: February 08, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: March 22, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT
* Tender Status: Expired

### Project Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites contractors to submit bids for the replacement of perimeter fencing and lighting at the Cowansville establishment.

### Key Submission Requirements

* Supporting documentation and bid submissions must be received by the latest deadline of 2 PM EDT on March 22, 2023.
* Bids submitted after 2 PM EDT on March 22, 2023, will be considered non-responsive.

### Tender Evaluation Criteria

The tender will be evaluated based on the lowest price submitted.

### Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

### Contracting Entity and End-User Entity

The contracting entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC). The end-user entity is also the PSPC at the same address.

### Contact Information

* Contact Name: Anton Moses
* Contact Email: [anton.moses@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:anton.moses@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Contact Phone and Fax: Not provided
* Contact Address: Not provided

### Tender Documents and Additional Information

For further details and required tender documents, please refer to the following link:
[http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15359348?extsite=MTUzNTkzNDhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15359348?extsite=MTUzNTkzNDhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) [Titles to be up to your focus].  Attention to format, writing quality, feasibility of details, and any thing missed on src maybe. 

Your guidance anticipated on that, looking forward to futher precise sensation
